column1: Gempol-Pandan Toll Road is a toll road in East Java
column2: Indonesia. This 13.6 kilometers (8.5 mi) highway connects Gempol and  with Pandaan of Pasuruan Regency. The toll road is opened in May
column3: 2015.This toll road is a continuation of the Surabayaâ€“Porong Toll Road that will be connected to Pandaan-Malang Toll Road.This toll was built to help lessen the traffic congestion on the existing inter-city roads connecting Surabaya and Malang.
